document.heading: EAST OF THE RIVER HOSPITAL REVITALIZATION AMENDMENT ACT OF 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-167, the “East of the River Hospital Revitalization Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-484 which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 4, 2008, and April 1, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 14, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-341 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-167 became effective on June 5, 2008.
